a guide to all that doesnt know how to use the torent:

1.
Unrar it with WinRar (http://www.rarlabs.com)
2.
Mount it with Daemon tools(http://www.snabbstart.com/download/daemon-tools)
3.
You will now see a install window (or go to the mounted drive and open it)
Install THPS4 from it
4.
Now, play and have fun, because Skateboarding is for life. :)

If you dont know how to change the controls do this:
When you click on the Icon to play the game it should pop up a square where you start the game from. There is some options in this square it is a line in the top of the square there it should say (options, keyboard and gamepad) you push the button that says Keyboard there you can change the controls it's verry easy you could use my settings that goes like this: 
From the top:
Up
Down 
Left 
Right
Space
G
E
R
A
H

If it appears an poppup box you just push yes 
because it's some of the controls used in 2 player. 
Please do not get angry at me or something for wrighting all this JUST TRYING TO HELP!!!

What does SEEDING mean?How can I seed?

mucst:
"Seeding" means uploading the File.

(taken by the pirate bay-faq)


Seeds:    Users that have 100 % of the file(s).
Peers:    Users that have not completed the file(s). 0?99 %
Leechers:    Same as peers.

FOR ALL MAC-USERS:

Okay, for all of you Mac-Users out there, this is how it works:

-Download the File
-----------------------------
-Extract both Files:

"Tony_Hawks_Pro_Skater_4.CD1.Razor1911.X-Gamers.ShareReactor.bin"

and:
"Tony_Hawks_Pro_Skater_4.CD2.Razor1911.X-Gamers.ShareReactor.bin"
-----------------------------------------
-Open Toast Titanium and go to "Copy" there you have to choose "Image-File". Choose the following File:
"Tony_Hawks_Pro_Skater_4.CD1.Razor1911.X-Gamers.ShareReactor.bin"
----------------------------------
-Then burn the CD.
(YOU HAVE TO BURN A CD, WHEN YOU JUST MOUNT, YOU´LL GET THE ERROR!)
-----------------------------
-When the CD is burned, insert it, and start the installation of THPS4
----------------------------
-When he asks for the second disk, you have to MOUNT the following File via Toast Titanium:

"Tony_Hawks_Pro_Skater_4.CD2.Razor1911.X-Gamers.ShareReactor.bin"
----------------------------
-Complete the download. 
----------------------------
Notice: The CD-Key is in the discription here.


Good Luck! I hope it helps you!

Hey thaeter, i had the same problem, and I think the game isnt compatible with leopard, not even sure if its compatible with 10.4, so not really sure what to do from here.

Okay for people trying to get it to run on leopard i found this on demoid by alterecho:
All right guys here's deal to get it work it with on leopard with intel. and it works like a charm. I was upset like other people but, before i call asshole to the people i just googled the problem and here's solution

Copy (don't move) this folder:
System/Library/Frameworks/CoreServices.framework/Versions/A/Frameworks/LaunchServices.framework
to this location:
System/Library/Frameworks/ApplicationServices.framework/Versions/A/Frameworks

? have a macbook intel core 2 duo with 10.5.6.
Im downloading now, so if anyone could try it and report back?
Well that method works guys, so people on leopard are sorted.
